Text.Name: Lv4_ProtectTime
Text.Desc: Fortuitous adventure events will not occur during the safety period.
Text.Values.0.Name: None
Text.Values.0.Desc: There will be no safety period.
Text.Values.1.Name: Short
Text.Values.2.Name: Medium
Text.Values.3.Name: Long
Text.Values.4.Name: Endless
Text.Values.4.Desc: Events will not occur in this game.

Text.Name: Lv4_IntervalMin
Text.Desc: The minimum interval between two fortuitous adventure events.
Text.Values.0.Name: Short
Text.Values.1.Name: Medium
Text.Values.2.Name: Long

Text.Name: Lv4_IntervalMax
Text.Desc: If the maximum interval has passed with no fortuitous adventure event occuring, the next event will be a fortuitous adventure.
Text.Values.0.Name: Short
Text.Values.1.Name: Medium
Text.Values.2.Name: Long
